text_4: A cozy living room with beige carpet and floral wallpaper. A comfortable-looking sofa sits against one wall, and a wooden coffee table occupies the center of the room. A doorway in the background leads to the kitchen, allowing partial visibility into that space. Tom, the blue-gray cat, notices movement in the kitchen doorway and slowly turns his head toward it. His ears perk up slightly as his eyes focus on the kitchen area.
text_5: A cozy living room with beige carpet and floral wallpaper. A comfortable-looking sofa sits against one wall, and a wooden coffee table occupies the center of the room. A doorway in the background leads to the kitchen, allowing partial visibility into that space. Tom, the blue-gray cat, sits up on the sofa, his gaze fixed intently on the kitchen doorway. His tail twitches slowly behind him as he concentrates on something in the other room.
text_6: A cozy living room with beige carpet and floral wallpaper. A comfortable-looking sofa sits against one wall, and a wooden coffee table occupies the center of the room. A doorway in the background leads to the kitchen, allowing partial visibility into that space. Tom, the blue-gray cat, carefully slides off the sofa and stands on all fours on the carpet. He stretches his front legs forward, extending his claws slightly before retracting them.
text_7: A cozy living room with beige carpet and floral wallpaper. A comfortable-looking sofa sits against one wall, and a wooden coffee table occupies the center of the room. A doorway in the background leads to the kitchen, allowing partial visibility into that space. Tom, the blue-gray cat, walks slowly across the living room toward the kitchen doorway. His movements are deliberate and quiet, with his body low to the ground and his eyes focused ahead.
text_8: The kitchen doorway frames the view into the kitchen. The white tiled floor and wooden cabinets are visible from this vantage point. The kitchen table with its checkered tablecloth can be seen in the center of the room. Tom, the blue-gray cat, stands in the doorway, peering into the kitchen with his paws on the threshold. Jerry, the brown mouse, sits on the table, still enjoying his piece of cheese, unaware of Tom's presence.
text_9: The kitchen doorway frames the view into the kitchen. The white tiled floor and wooden cabinets are visible from this vantage point. The kitchen table with its checkered tablecloth can be seen in the center of the room. Tom, the blue-gray cat, takes one slow step into the kitchen, his paws touching the tiled floor silently. Jerry, the brown mouse, continues eating his cheese, his back turned to the doorway where Tom stands.
text_10: The kitchen doorway frames the view into the kitchen. The white tiled floor and wooden cabinets are visible from this vantage point. The kitchen table with its checkered tablecloth can be seen in the center of the room. Tom, the blue-gray cat, freezes in place as Jerry, the brown mouse, suddenly stops eating and looks up from his cheese. Jerry's nose twitches as if sensing something, but he hasn't yet turned around to see Tom.
text_11: A close-up view of the kitchen table with its checkered tablecloth. Crumbs of cheese are scattered around a half-eaten piece of yellow cheese at the center. The wooden edge of the table frames the bottom of the shot. Jerry, the brown mouse, sits beside his cheese, now turned toward the kitchen doorway with wide eyes and alert posture.
text_12: A close-up view of the kitchen table with its checkered tablecloth. Crumbs of cheese are scattered around a half-eaten piece of yellow cheese at the center. The wooden edge of the table frames the bottom of the shot. Jerry, the brown mouse, takes a step back from his cheese, his small body tensing as he spots Tom, the blue-gray cat, visible at the edge of the frame.
text_13: A wider view of the kitchen showing both the table and the doorway. The white tiled floor reflects the sunlight coming through the window. Wooden cabinets line the walls on either side. Jerry, the brown mouse, stands frozen on the table next to his cheese. Tom, the blue-gray cat, stands equally still just inside the doorway, his eyes locked with Jerry's in a classic standoff pose.
text_14: A wider view of the kitchen showing both the table and the doorway. The white tiled floor reflects the sunlight coming through the window. Wooden cabinets line the walls on either side. Tom, the blue-gray cat, takes one slow step forward into the kitchen, his eyes never leaving Jerry. Jerry, the brown mouse, backs up slightly on the table, putting one paw protectively on his piece of cheese.
text_15: A close-up of a window in the kitchen wall. Through the glass panes, a garden is visible with green grass, flowering bushes, and a large oak tree providing shade. Sunlight filters through leaves, creating dappled patterns on the ground. A wooden garden bench can be seen beneath the tree. Both Tom, the blue-gray cat, and Jerry, the brown mouse, look toward the window, momentarily distracted from their standoff.
text_16: A lush garden with vibrant green grass and colorful flower beds. A large oak tree dominates one side of the scene, casting gentle shadows across the lawn. A wooden bench sits under the tree, partially bathed in dappled sunlight. Tom, the blue-gray cat, walks slowly into the garden from the left side, his head turning to take in the peaceful surroundings.
text_17: A lush garden with vibrant green grass and colorful flower beds. A large oak tree dominates one side of the scene, casting gentle shadows across the lawn. A wooden bench sits under the tree, partially bathed in dappled sunlight. Jerry, the brown mouse, emerges from a small hole at the base of a nearby wall, stepping cautiously onto the grass. Tom, the blue-gray cat, continues walking toward the bench, not yet noticing Jerry's presence in the garden.
text_18: A lush garden with vibrant green grass and colorful flower beds. A large oak tree dominates one side of the scene, casting gentle shadows across the lawn. A wooden bench sits under the tree, partially bathed in dappled sunlight. Tom, the blue-gray cat, reaches the wooden bench and slowly climbs onto it, settling into a comfortable position. Jerry, the brown mouse, watches from a safe distance, partially hidden behind a small flower.
text_19: A lush garden with vibrant green grass and colorful flower beds. A large oak tree dominates one side of the scene, casting gentle shadows across the lawn. A wooden bench sits under the tree, partially bathed in dappled sunlight. Tom, the blue-gray cat, stretches out on the bench, his eyes growing heavy in the warm sunlight. Jerry, the brown mouse, approaches the bench cautiously, staying close to the ground as he moves.
text_20: A lush garden with vibrant green grass and colorful flower beds. A large oak tree dominates one side of the scene, casting gentle shadows across the lawn. A wooden bench sits under the tree, partially bathed in dappled sunlight. Tom, the blue-gray cat, has fallen asleep on the bench, his chest rising and falling with slow, steady breaths. Jerry, the brown mouse, has curled up at the opposite end of the same bench, also sleeping peacefully in the afternoon sun.
